  freestar.config = freestar.config || {};

        <div class="grid-container" id="main-content">
                            <div class="grid-x grid-margin-x">
    <div class="small-12 medium-12 large-9 cell">

        <div class="grid-x bg-white grid-padding-x grid-padding-y" style="width: 100%; position: relative;" itemtype="http://schema.org/Product" itemscope><div class="cell small-12" id="toptop"><h1 <div class="freeStarFragrantica" align="center" data-freestar-ad="__300x300" id="fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_1" v-pre>
</div></div></div><div class="grid-x grid-margin-x grid-margin-y"><div class="cell small-6"><likes-rating :perfume_id="70052" chart="show" type-chart="small-chart" colors="retro"></likes-rating></div><div class="cell small-6"><seasons-rating :perfume_id="70052" chart="show" type-chart="small-chart" colors="retro"></seasons-rating></div><div class="small-12 medium-6 text-center" style="max-height: 50px"><div itemprop="aggregateRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/AggregateRating" itemscope><p class="info-note">Perfume rating&nbsp;<span itemprop="ratingValue">4.12</span>&nbsp;out of&nbsp;<span itemprop="bestRating">5</span> with&nbsp;<span itemprop="ratingCount" content="6619">6,619</span> votes<meta itemprop="reviewCount" content="1207"/></p></div></div></div><div class="grid-x grid-margin-x grid-margin-y"><div class="cell small-12" itemprop="description" v-pre><p><b>Eilish</b> by <b>Billie Eilish</b> is a Oriental Vanilla fragrance for women. <b>Eilish</b> was launched in 2021. The nose behind this fragrance is Steve DeMercado. Top notes are Sugar, Red Berries and Mandarin Orange; middle notes are Vanilla, Cacao, Spicy Notes and Rose; base notes are Tonka Bean, Amber, Musk and Woody Notes. </p><div v-pre class='fragrantica-blockquote'><p>Eilish is a vanilla-based fragrance.</p></div><p class="reviewstrigger" style="font-size: smaller; color: #83a6c4">Read about this perfume in other languages: <a                     Weak projection

                            <div class="cell small-12" style="display: inline-flex; margin: 0.4rem;word-wrap: break-word;padding: 0 0.6rem 0 0.6rem;">
                    <div class="fa-lg" style="display: flex; align-items: center; color: grey; cursor: pointer;">
                    <div style="display: inline-flex;">
                        <div class="vote-box-sp-ai">
                            <span>
                            <i class="far fa-thumbs-up"></i>
                                 </span>
                            <div class="num-votes-sp"><span style="font-size: 0.8rem;">92</span></div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="vote-box-sp-ai">
                             <span>
                            <i class="far fa-thumbs-down"></i>
                             </span>
                            <div class="num-votes-sp"><span style="font-size: 0.8rem;">306</span></div>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                    </div>
                    Expensive for what it offers
                </div>
                    </div>
    </div>
</div>

</fragram-photos-wrapper><div class="cell small-12"><div class="grid-x grid-padding-y" id="pyramid"><div class="cell"><div style="display: flex; flex-direction: column; justify-content: center; text-align: center; background: white;"><div class="strike-title"><span>Perfume Pyramid</span></div><pyramid-switch :perfume_id="70052"><pyramid-notes title="Main Notes According to Your Votes"></pyramid-notes><h4 style="margin-top: 0.5rem"><b>Top Notes</b></h4><pyramid-level notes="top"><div style="display: flex; justify-content: center; text-align: center; flex-wrap: wrap; align-items: flex-end; flex-direction: row; padding: 0.5rem;"><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 1; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.200.jpg" style="width: 4.225rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Sugar-200.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Sugar</div></div><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.86407633150587; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.184.jpg" style="width: 3.1rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Red-Berries-184.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Red Berries</div></div><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.80477139066561; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.82.jpg" style="width: 2.8rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Mandarin-Orange-82.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Mandarin Orange</div></div></div>
</pyramid-level><h4 style="margin-top: 0.5rem"><b>Middle Notes</b></h4><pyramid-level notes="middle"><div style="display: flex; justify-content: center; text-align: center; flex-wrap: wrap; align-items: flex-end; flex-direction: row; padding: 0.5rem;"><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 1; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.74.jpg" style="width: 5rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Vanilla-74.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Vanilla</div></div><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 1; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.135.jpg" style="width: 4rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Cacao-Pod-135.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Cacao</div></div><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.94590744661054; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.321.jpg" style="width: 3.6rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Spicy-Notes-321.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Spicy Notes</div></div><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.73508893593265; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.105.jpg" style="width: 2.5rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Rose-105.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Rose</div></div></div>
</pyramid-level><h4 style="margin-top: 0.5rem"><b>Base Notes</b></h4><pyramid-level notes="base"><div style="display: flex; justify-content: center; text-align: center; flex-wrap: wrap; align-items: flex-end; flex-direction: row; padding: 0.5rem;"><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.9309550323503; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.73.jpg" style="width: 3.5rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Tonka-Bean-73.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Tonka Bean</div></div><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.89903623487364; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.54.jpg" style="width: 3.3rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Amber-54.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Amber</div></div><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.89059960754954; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.4.jpg" style="width: 3.25rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Musk-4.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Musk</div></div><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.88196601125011; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.315.jpg" style="width: 3.2rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Woody-Notes-315.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Woody Notes</div></div></div>
</pyramid-level></pyramid-switch></div></div><div class="cell text-center"><button class="button small" data-open="NotesRatingModal">Vote for Ingredients</button></div></div><notes-rating :perfume_id="70052"></notes-rating></div><div class="cell small-12"><vue-encrypt-postscribe slotid='aeb9317d9833549252056a210e78cd53805' slotpayload='{"ct":"yeScpVZZSkeVAV2x8DAJso1pn4hus9stX6qqsP4x74QVWNY\/SKod1FmVQA4FagZNrwz98+SxxsdjwtU3MsMwyV7PP3S400\/lr0zvziUvIh+Fc+Kgjjx3Zzv9z9psJXI39M2SLJxWsHIrT7lo0yrDWrL\/M7+P8YThmdbelyKVVk28N\/rR\/rIcm3\/lJ3NvcNq1pZ4P\/X7Dz6fdeCUkM25sEaiFAUvyl3oFh8XNQkYfLqMDp2H4Cl1y3LOchbXAc\/hJWwhycLwoK3f1bgqv2snQViP1CyTmQAWfN2CkS7MRiDIQyn02kBn3XuVcN0R2Kc9P","iv":"debb72a90983339ff6f7d863e7bff4d8","s":"d336bb20944c7dac"}'></vue-encrypt-postscribe></div><div class="cell small-12"><div class="grid-x grid-padding-x grid-padding-y"><!-- Tag ID: fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_3 -->

<div class="freeStarFragrantica" align="center" data-freestar-ad="__300x300" id="fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_5" v-pre>
</div></div><div class="cell small-12"><ul class="tabs" data-deep-link="true" data-update-history="true" data-deep-link-smudge="true" data-deep-link-smudge-delay="500" data-tabs id="deeplinked-tabs"><li class="tabs-title is-active"><a href="#all-reviews" aria-selected="true"><svg class="menu" style="width: 1rem; height: 1rem;display: inline-block" fill="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 20 20" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M10 18a8 8 0 100-16 8 8 0 000 16zm1-12a1 1 0 10-2 0v4a1 1 0 00.293.707l2.828 2.829a1 1 0 101.415-1.415L11 9.586V6z"clip-rule="evenodd"></path></svg>All reviews by date</a></li><li class="tabs-title"><a href="#popular-positive-reviews"><svg class="menu hide-for-medium" style="width: 1rem; height: 1rem;"></like><span class="show-for-medium">Positive Reviews</span></a></li><li class="tabs-title"><a href="#popular-negative-reviews"><svg class="menu hide-for-medium" style="width: 1rem; height: 1rem;display: inline-block" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 24 24" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="2" d="M7 8h10M7 12h4m1 8l-4-4H5a2 2 0 01-2-2V6a2 2 0 012-2h14a2 2 0 012 2v8a2 2 0 01-2 2h-3l-4 4z"></path></svg><dislike style="width: 1rem; height: 1rem;"></dislike><span class="show-for-medium">Negative Reviews</span></a></li><li class="tabs-title"><a href="#search-reviews"><svg class="menu hide-for-medium" style="width: 1rem; height: 1rem;display: inline-block" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 24 24" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="2" d="M7 8h10M7 12h4m1 8l-4-4H5a2 2 0 01-2-2V6a2 2 0 012-2h14a2 2 0 012 2v8a2 2 0 01-2 2h-3l-4 4z"></path></svg><i class="fas fa-search"></i><span class="show-for-medium">Search</span></a></li></ul><reviews-wrapper><div class="tabs-content" data-tabs-content="deeplinked-tabs"><div class="tabs-panel is-active" id="all-reviews"><div class="cell">
    <div class="strike-title"><span>All Reviews By Date</span></div>
    <div class="grid-x grid-padding-x grid-margin-y" style="position: relative; padding: 0 0.25rem 0 0.25rem;">
        <div class="cell destinationreview"></div>                    <div id="parent2372194" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2372194" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Kikixxxx"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1223238"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1223238.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Kikixxxx" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-50384.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.50384.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Cloud"title="Cloud"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2372194ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2372194" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1223238">Kikixxxx</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-12-05"></span><fromunixtime unixtime="1733442946" class="vote-button-legend"></fromunixtime></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Right I NEVER get complimented on my perfume. When I hear ppl going ppl run after me in the street to ask what Im wearing I think really?? Because literally no one has ever stopped me and asked me what perfume Im wearing. That is  until I bought this.<br />
I bought it Sunday and its now Wednesday and Ive had TWO total strangers compliment my perfume. I dont even feel like it projects that much but it must do. Its a lovely vanilla ice cream, its sweet but not overly sweet. I dont feel like this is juvenile ( even tho its so hyped up on tik tok ) <br />
I am loving it so far!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70052"comment_id="2372194"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-70052.html?ccid=2372194#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2371603" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2371603" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Meli_97"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1332101"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Meli_97" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2371603ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2371603" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1332101">Meli_97</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-12-05"></span><fromunixtime unixtime="1733407225" class="vote-button-legend"></fromunixtime></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I really like this one, its very linear. Sadly it gave me a headache.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70052"comment_id="2371603"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-70052.html?ccid=2371603#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2371382" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2371382" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="SimonsTux"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1456639"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="SimonsTux" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Dior/Poison-Girl-35561.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.35561.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Poison Girl"title="Poison Girl"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2371382ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2371382" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1456639">SimonsTux</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-12-04"></span><fromunixtime unixtime="1733385415" class="vote-button-legend"></fromunixtime></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>To me this is a minty vanilla. Easy wear, likeable, lasts well. I have a 100ml BUT honestly, the dupe Nebras is better and cheaper.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70052"comment_id="2371382"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-70052.html?ccid=2371382#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2371347" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2371347" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ashley.31386"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/841900"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="ashley.31386" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Henry-Rose/Dark-is-Night-54616.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.54616.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Dark is Night"title="Dark is Night"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2371347ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2371347" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/841900">ashley.31386</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-12-04"></span><fromunixtime unixtime="1733380804" class="vote-button-legend"></fromunixtime></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>One of my new favorites! To preface this review, I have a long history with vanilla going back to the 90s when I wore Vanilla Lace from Victorias Secret, and have worn every popular vanilla scent on and off since. To me, this isnt a typical warm vanilla scent like a lot of other people describe it. Its interesting and very different from any other vanilla I've owned. I am a gourmand lover to my core, so I think I love this because it instantly piqued my interest when it wasnt my traditional warm, gourmand. I really had to to understand it at first. My nose detects a cooler vanilla, with hints of cocoa and mint. On initial blast, I definitely get that minty vanilla, but as it dries down, my skin is left with almost nothing except pure vanilla and a beautiful Tonka bean. Depending on the day, I can detect the berries and citrus as well, but they dont last. What youre left with is hours and hours of vanilla and Tonka, which is totally my jam! I love to layer this, or wear it by itself, but I find I get the best results when I layer it with different vanilla scented lotions and oils. Im on my second bottle and can imagine always keeping a bottle of this in my collection.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70052"comment_id="2371347"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-70052.html?ccid=2371347#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2370931" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2370931" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="cokedupmilf"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1883552"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="cokedupmilf" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2370931ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2370931" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1883552">cokedupmilf</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-12-04"></span><fromunixtime unixtime="1733349205" class="vote-button-legend"></fromunixtime></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>LOVE this. its so sweet and simple, u could never go wrong with this. i reach for this on days i feel cute and on days i would rather blend in in the background. for me, its a bit smokey(?) and a tiny bit of a masculine vanilla (which is what i love). I get what people say when they smell mint though, but I love that part of it too.<br />
<br />
I blind bought this, and I'd say it's safe as a blind buy.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70052"comment_id="2370931"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-70052.html?ccid=2370931#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.86); padding: 0; border: none; margin: 0;"><!-- Tag ID: fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_6 -->

In theory I should like this once the base notes come through as they are all scents I generally like but I dont detect them even after a few hours of wearing it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; It smells like physics A-levels and comfy sweaters and hoodies.<br />
Vanillic and marshmallow heavenlyness</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70052"comment_id="2368190"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-70052.html?ccid=2368190#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2368023" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2368023" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="arigirasol"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2038267"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2038267.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="arigirasol" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-70052.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.70052.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Eilish"title="Eilish"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2368023ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2368023" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2038267">arigirasol</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-12-02">12/02/24 06:09</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It's so confusing to me why I don't *love* this perfume. It has everything I like, vanilla, spice, mandarin orange, amber, musk... But there's something about it that just makes me go "meh". <br />
<br />
I don't know if it's because it smells like cheap ice cream to me, and I'm just not a big ice cream person. <br />
<br />
It's a pretty sweet perfume, it's so hyped. But for me, it's really, really mid, and I don't mean it in a snobby way. Some days I like it a bit, but most days I wonder what is it that's preventing me from loving it lol</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70052"comment_id="2368023"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-70052.html?ccid=2368023#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2367516" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2367516" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Stephhhhs"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2292909"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Stephhhhs" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2367516ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2367516" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2292909">Stephhhhs</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-12-01">12/01/24 15:55</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It is quite one dimensional despite the various notes, but it smells so good. Mostly leaves the vanilla and tonka bean. A great gourmand vanilla. Cakey, sweet, but not overpowering or syrupy or too childish. Reminiscent of sol de Janeiro but less nutty/caramely. I find that it lasts quite long, I can even smell it on my clothes the next day. Has a good silage, and I often get compliments on it. It is perfect for layering and works well with soooo many scents, very versatile for this purpose and I love it for that.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70052"comment_id="2367516"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-70052.html?ccid=2367516#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2367076" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2367076" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="aleea"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2073882"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="aleea" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2367076ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2367076" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2073882">aleea</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-12-01">12/01/24 07:32</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I loveeee this perfume so much. It smells so clean gourmand with the perfect mix of vanilla. Sometimes i can smell it on my self throughout the day but not reallly. I dont get the synthetic smell i think that it is just not extremely vanilla so it may throw some people off. If you want something really vanilla and chocolatey chocomusk is better than this but the eilish perfume offers more of a mature scent so it is like an upgrade. It is kinda overpriced for the size of the bottle but i love the smell too muchh.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70052"comment_id="2367076"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-70052.html?ccid=2367076#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2366069" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Smells like lipgloss and sugar and cake. Boring and one dimensional. I like a gourmand but with some complexity. This is dull, no depth and slightly plasticky. Good for young girls I suppose</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70052"comment_id="2366069"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-70052.html?ccid=2366069#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2365359" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2365359" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Gabburrito"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2335769"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2335769.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Gabburrito" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2365359ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2365359" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2335769">Gabburrito</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-29">11/29/24 15:29</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Reminds me a lot of Dulce by Rosie Jane. Its a tad more complex than that fragrance, I think I still prefer Dulce but this one is soo close in the dry down it would probably be hard to tell which is which since it dries extremely vanilla on me and the other notes disappear after awhile. Which doesnt bother me as Im a vanilla and gourmand lover. Id probably use this perfume to layer, and wear it by itself for nights in or Christmas parties. It makes me feel more feminine than sexy. I love it as a vanilla lover, but understand why some people would say its not very complex. But I still love having it in my collection, especially to layer.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70052"comment_id="2365359"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-70052.html?ccid=2365359#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2365300" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2365300" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Cicchod&#039;argento"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2094180"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2094180.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Cicchod&#039;argento" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2365300ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2365300" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2094180">Cicchod&#039;argento</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-29">11/29/24 14:50</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is to this day the most amazing perfume I've ever smelled... that is, on someone else. Vanilla, dark hot chocolate and amber, projected softly but into the whole room. It was the highlight of my day the days I smelled that perfume. On me it still smells good, but it lasts less and projects much weaker and (to me) mostly smells of sugar. It's almost so that I don't smell the vanilla on me, but my friends do so it must be to my nose only. I've only tried it for a few days as of now, but as of yet it's a very sugary and linear scent that sits close to my skin. It's very nice, just nothing of the magic that it was on this other person I knew, unfortunately :,)</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70052"comment_id="2365300"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-70052.html?ccid=2365300#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2364686" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1096198">fluffydeathkitty</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-29">11/29/24 02:13</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This perfume opens up with chocolate vanilla, which soon turns into chocolate vanilla and is finally followed by chocolate vanilla. It is not a bad scent by any means, just uncomplicated and juvenile. I like the milkiness of it but it is really no different to any cheap gourmand body spray.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70052"comment_id="2364686"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-70052.html?ccid=2364686#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2364669" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2364669" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ghostofvic"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2284204"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2284204.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="ghostofvic" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Valentino/Valentino-Donna-Born-In-Roma-Intense-78739.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.78739.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Valentino Donna Born In Roma Intense"title="Valentino Donna Born In Roma Intense"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2364669ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2364669" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2284204">ghostofvic</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-29">11/29/24 01:45</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It's a beautiful gourmand fragrance, don't get me wrong, but it's not something groundbreaking or unique. It has a beautiful drydown, but when I first sprayed it on my skin it smelt very artificial with the cacao and the woody notes overpowering the vanilla, which thankfully comes forward almost an hour into the drydown. Doesn't smell like vanilla extract to me like a lot of people claim. Not really my cup of tea.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70052"comment_id="2364669"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-70052.html?ccid=2364669#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2364014" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2364014" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="toldo1959"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2209346"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="toldo1959" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2364014ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2364014" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2209346">toldo1959</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-28">11/28/24 08:50</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This one was a total surprise for me!  My first foray into a vanilla gourmand and despite myself I love it!  This starts beautifully warm with a slight berry scent.  It deepens into a warm slightly spicy vanilla with the cocoa just coming through.  I find myself reaching for it day after day.  I started out with the 1 oz bottle and just bought the 3 ounce bottle.  Im usually one and done with most scents but this one is my go to for Fall and Winter.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70052"comment_id="2364014"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-70052.html?ccid=2364014#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2363522" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70052"comment_id="2359915"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-70052.html?ccid=2359915#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2357692" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2357692" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Lauren11"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2326650"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Lauren11" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Tocca/Lucia-85230.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.85230.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Lucia"title="Lucia"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2357692ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2357692" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2326650">Lauren11</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-22">11/22/24 10:22</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>To me it is a pretty straightforward vanilla scent. It's pleasant and not overpowering.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70052"comment_id="2357692"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-70052.html?ccid=2357692#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2356599" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2356599" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="pursueliving"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1335270"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1335270.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="pursueliving" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/The-Dua-Brand/Popped-Cherry-65862.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.65862.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Popped Cherry"title="Popped Cherry"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2356599ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2356599" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1335270">pursueliving</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-21">11/21/24 10:29</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Absolutely delicious!  Warm, gourmand but not heavy and not chocolate in spite of the cacao.  (Cacao is in the mix but blended so well that it's not overpowering.)  The vanilla blends well with the Mandarin orange and the red berries and the cacao for a truly dreamy, creamy scent. The spices help to keep it balanced and the vanilla keeps it warm and inviting.  Not only does it draw compliments, I compliment my "self" for purchasing it.  Longevity is good at 7-8 hours, sillage is good, a day or night scent that's priced right.  Definitely a safe blind buy and office friendly but worthy of being a signature scent.  People will ask you what you're wearing and I love smelling my little scent bubble all day.  10/10.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70052"comment_id="2356599"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-70052.html?ccid=2356599#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2355968" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2355968" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Ruby.h170"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2202617"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Ruby.h170" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2355968ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2355968" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2202617">Ruby.h170</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-20">11/20/24 20:08</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I absolutely LOVE this bottle. I think in the beginning I got some soap for some reason, but that went away I think I was just getting used to all the notes coming together. This smells like a creamy and kinda spicy vanilla that is not overly sweet. I have a sample of Nebras from lattafa and the opening here is definitely sweeter and more pleasant due to sugar being in the opening notes, but Nebras has a more sugary and cocoa dry down and it lasts much longer. Because of this I will be getting Nebras after I finish this bottle. I really am enjoying it regardless.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70052"comment_id="2355968"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-70052.html?ccid=2355968#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2355772" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Couldnt stand the smell.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70052"comment_id="2353392"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-70052.html?ccid=2353392#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2351652" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2351652" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="TT40"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2288446"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2288446.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="TT40" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2351652ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2351652" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2288446">TT40</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-17">11/17/24 01:45</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This perfume is very interesting and unique. It does smell like vanilla mixed with spice. The spice in this perfume kind of smells like menthol. I do overall like this fragrance but I dont think its blind buy safe.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70052"comment_id="2351652"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-70052.html?ccid=2351652#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2351366" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2351366" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="billiexpau"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2325583"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="billiexpau" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2351366ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2351366" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2325583">billiexpau</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-16">11/16/24 17:25</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Very sweet but not overpowering, smells AMAZING and its long lasting. I personally use it everyday and Ive received a lot of compliments, the fragrance smells a lot like warm vanilla and spices but also a bit chocolate-y. Honestly the price-quality ratio is amazing, one bottle lasted me about a year and a half (keep in mind I use it everyday), I also love the bottle design, its so sexy. Strongly recommend getting it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70052"comment_id="2351366"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-70052.html?ccid=2351366#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2350513" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2350513" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="bananamiik"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2233626"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2233626.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="bananamiik" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-76824.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.76824.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Sweet Tooth"title="Sweet Tooth"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2350513ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2350513" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2233626">bananamiik</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-15">11/15/24 20:57</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Delicious, long-lasting, and strong. Sweet without being overpowering. Very cozy and safe feeling, perfect for the fall and/or winter. I don't get any orange or rose (which is good because I hate florals), but the sugar, vanilla, spice, and base notes come through very well. One of my go-to's for the past few years!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70052"comment_id="2350513"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-70052.html?ccid=2350513#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2348009" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Its here. Its warm, cozy, no hints of lavender or ginger that are interesting but can be distracting or headache inducing. No, this is the one you remember and the one youve been looking for. 100/10, no notes, just warm, cozy vanilla.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70052"comment_id="2348009"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-70052.html?ccid=2348009#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2347253" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Smells like vanilla ice cream. I wish it has more sillage though. Scent lasts when you smell your clothes but no trail in my experience. I would normally layer my perfumes but this is surprisingly good on its own.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70052"comment_id="2347233"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-70052.html?ccid=2347233#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2347013" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2347013" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="gourmand_divaa"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2319929"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2319929.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="gourmand_divaa" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2347013ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2347013" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2319929">gourmand_divaa</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-12">11/12/24 19:00</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>YUMMY! Every time I've worn this I've received compliments. It does smell very spicy at first but the dry down is pure vanilla extract. This was a blind buy for me and at first spray I felt regret but as soon as it dried down I fell in love and still smell the lid for comfort. My mum is usually picky of my perfume choices and she loves this scent too! The people upset about the bottle design are upset for literally nothing. It's not offensive especially when the contents is literally liquid gold! If you love vanilla you  will undoubtedly love this. Love this for colder days or dinner out. Great silage and longevity. Not exactly cheap for a celebrity fragrance, but considering the quality the price is incredible! It is a true must have. My new forever favourite, I WILL be buying backups!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70052"comment_id="2347013"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-70052.html?ccid=2347013#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2345458" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Nothing fancy though.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70052"comment_id="2344785"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-70052.html?ccid=2344785#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2344478" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; this one does not work with my nose. It was all red berries and not in a good way for me. The dry down is better but I was forcing myself to like it at that point. My family liked it on me, so it is clearly a "me" issue, but in case it is helpful to anyone... This was not vanilla/caramel/chocolate on me at all.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70052"comment_id="2343689"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-70052.html?ccid=2343689#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2343352" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; I get lots of the cacao and the spicy notes. whenever I put this on, I literally cant stop smelling myself its just that good. in my opinion its a great vanilla fragrance for the colder days!! definitely get it if u can! </p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1747732">Melody Valentine</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-08">11/08/24 09:44</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is beautiful! I sprayed a decent amount of it from a tester today in Savers and I could smell it blowing in the cold wind all the way home. To me it smells like coco butter and vanilla with the tiniest hint of something fruity. I smelled like milk chocolate all the way home and I was this close to going back and buying it but I'm trying really hard not to buy any more perfume for a while. It kinda reminds me of Choco Musk too but much stronger and without the strong alcoholic opening. It's what I wanted Choco Musk to smell like really. I'm still getting bits of it now tbh, I can keep smelling chocolate whenever I move my arm. I can tell it'll layer with other scents beautifully too. I want it so badly but now I have to decide whether to get this or Nebras. I think it was 24.99 for the 30ml (maybe 50ml) and Nebras is about the same price for 100ml. Then I really am done with perfume for the rest of the year </p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70052"comment_id="2342110"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-70052.html?ccid=2342110#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2340836" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
