padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2340073" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="x_maria.r"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2313027"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2313027.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="x_maria.r" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2340073ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2340073" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2313027">x_maria.r</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-06">11/06/24 13:02</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is the second time I have bought this perfume! Its a warm, spicy vanilla scent. Think of a masala chai with a spoon of vanilla extract, thats the vibe. The vanilla is well blended with the spicy cocoa notes. It surprisingly last a long time and Ive received many compliments! So considering the price, I think this is a really good winter signature perfume.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70052"comment_id="2340073"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-70052.html?ccid=2340073#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2339996" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2339665" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="red.Rugile"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2312674"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="red.Rugile" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2339665ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2339665" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2312674">red.Rugile</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-06">11/06/24 04:51</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I am addicted to buying perfume and this perfume is the only one I reach for on a daily basis. To me it just smells wealthy, sexy, clean, delicious and a bit playful. It is everything I was looking for in my signature smell. Perfect for the cold months. The only thing I don't like about it is that you need to spray a lot to be able to smell it on yourself. I am also not sure if other people can smell it on me when I wear it. Regardless, when I'm done with this bottle I will definitely repurchase.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70052"comment_id="2339665"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-70052.html?ccid=2339665#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2339508" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2271288">Wearedoomed</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-04">11/04/24 08:33</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I got a sample of it, sprayed it on my wrist at home, liked it already, and then I left the flat...and loved it even more outside in the chilly weather. I second the reviews saying it's comforting and cozy. It's such a feel-good scent! Mainly sweet, but also subtly spicy. I haven't tried any fragrances that are supposed to evoke the vibe of a cat's fur, but this one is actually the association that comes to my mind. Very cute! However, the parameters are not the best from what I've noticed so far.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70052"comment_id="2337705"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-70052.html?ccid=2337705#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2337381" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2337381" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="notarazor"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2295827"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2295827.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="notarazor" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Rabanne/Fame-Intense-89716.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.89716.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Fame Intense"title="Fame Intense"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2337381ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2337381" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2295827">notarazor</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-04">11/04/24 00:50</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>My one true love!!! lol but really. Been wearing it for most of this year and I am SO in love. Straight-sniff from the bottle itself, it's not just "vanilla." More like vanilla, dusted with powdered sugar, and a very light musky woody base. I've definitely gotten the most compliments wearing this one, and it lasts most of the day. I will say, I get told I "smell like candy" when I wear it, just getting a waft off of someone it smells a bit like sweetarts, or smarties maybe?? Definitely better for colder weather but I wore through spring and summer and it was only too cloying on the hottest days for me.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70052"comment_id="2337381"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-70052.html?ccid=2337381#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2337297" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2254967">caro.mil</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-01">11/01/24 13:08</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Was very excited to smell this because of how much people rave about it, and how it is the go-to affordable vanilla perfume. I don't know if it was a bad tester or something but I didn't get vanilla at all. Looking at the notes I know for a fact it was the cacao and spicy notes compared with the rose in the middle notes, which definitely overshadowed the vanilla middle note for me. Was very disappointed but if you want an affordable vanilla perfume, Vanilla Vice by Snif is FAR better in my opinion.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70052"comment_id="2334777"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-70052.html?ccid=2334777#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2334512" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2189799">aquagreenmoon</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-01">11/01/24 01:09</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Sugar, berries and vanilla!!  I love it its soooo addicting. Im a sucker for a vanilla scented perfume and this is in the 5 of the best</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70052"comment_id="2334158"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-70052.html?ccid=2334158#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2333874" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2332541" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="berrymilktea"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1854317"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1854317.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="berrymilktea" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2332541ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2332541" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1854317">berrymilktea</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-30">10/30/24 09:41</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is my favorite perfume for fall. I originally bought the target dupe for this, but it barely compares. If you want something sweeter get the Finery. Eillish is exactly what I was looking for. Every time I wear this, I pick up random wafts of myself throughout the day. It's so fun to wear. I don't know why it took me so long to understand that this perfume isn't all that warm. It's a cool girl walking to her class in the morning breeze listening to hip-pop on her overhead headphones. It's reading a book and drinking a warm dirty chai latte at a park during peak fall weather. It's a spicy fresh slightly warm toned scent. Perfect for everyday wear during cooler months.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70052"comment_id="2332541"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-70052.html?ccid=2332541#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2332449" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; I think this is a safe blind buy to those that like vanilla scents </p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70052"comment_id="2332449"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-70052.html?ccid=2332449#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2332164" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2332164" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="StephDepress"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1563304"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1563304.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="StephDepress" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Oud-Fleur-21401.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.21401.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Oud Fleur"title="Oud Fleur"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2332164ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2332164" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1563304">StephDepress</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-30">10/30/24 00:10</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Remarkably good scent for those winter nights and days where a comforting vanilla/caramel forward scent is desired. Reminiscent of Montales Intense Caf but more balanced with a hint of tartness and a resinous amber. Nothing to snub your nose at merely because it's in the name of a pop starlet. I think this is easily worthy of being referred to as a unisex fragrance. It was originally going to be a bottle for flipping after a test, but it's a keeper for sure.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70052"comment_id="2332164"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-70052.html?ccid=2332164#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2328802" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2328802" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="caulicake"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2238116"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2238116.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="caulicake" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2328802ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2328802" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2238116">caulicake</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-26">10/26/24 20:46</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Perfect vanilla for super cold weather. I'm talking Minnesotan winters, Christmas lights, fur-lined puffer coats. Beautifully cozy, smooth, woody and vanilla. I've had this for years and I still favor it over the majority of newer fragrances I've collected since then. It never gets old or boring because it is simply perfect.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70052"comment_id="2328802"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-70052.html?ccid=2328802#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2327301" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2327301" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Caleb847"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2073640"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2073640.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Caleb847" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2327301ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2327301" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2073640">Caleb847</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-25">10/25/24 10:34</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>By far one of the most smooth Carmel-ish vanilla (gourmand + sugar + cacao) i have had a taste of, but it's also very sweet it reminds me a of a lotion product I've had used in the past (no clue abt the name), but it's nice and also generic in a sense. It's Unisex (actually), a hot weather take, lovely sillage and pretty decent price.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70052"comment_id="2327301"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-70052.html?ccid=2327301#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2327207" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2298703">amehlia</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-25">10/25/24 09:02</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>v disappointed with this one. was expecting it to be much warmer and fuller based on other reviews, but the only notes i get are heavy spice and a vague sense of a very synthetic red berry smell. it does dry down okay-ish and the vanilla comes through a tiny bit then, but i find the smell doesnt last long enough on me to appreciate it. no hints of cacao for me either. overall a very harsh and unpleasant scent, plus the bottle is an absolutely nightmare to use.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; All I get is the red berry notes throughout. God this was probably the most disappointing purchase Ive ever done, Ive been wanting this one for years but as much as I love Billie Eilish, this perfume was a total disappointment. However, its not unbearable, just has utterly misleading notes for me</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70052"comment_id="2325366"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-70052.html?ccid=2325366#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2324856" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2324856" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ambemoon"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2294252"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2294252.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="ambemoon" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2324856ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2324856" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2294252">ambemoon</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-23">10/23/24 07:45</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>If you're looking for a sweet chocolate perfume, this is it. I hardly ever purchase celebrity perfumes, because they don't last very long. Having said that, this perfume smells lovely. On first spray, it smells like milk chocolate. It smells yummy and delightful. I don't pick up on the notes of orange or rose at all. When it dries down, I do pick up on the woody notes. This adds a bit of depth to the chocolate and turns it into a perfect fall/winter scent. However, it doesn't last very long, like most celebrity perfumes that I've tried. Other than the longevity of the perfume, it is a beautiful scent that's not too girly or juvenile. I spray it on my clothing to make it last longer, and that seems to help. Sometimes I layer one of my sweeter perfumes on top to give it a more hot cocoa vibe. I think this is a safe blind buy if you're looking for a sweet, chocolate, woody scent. I'm just disappointed with the lasting power. Other than that, I think it smells delicious.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70052"comment_id="2324856"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-70052.html?ccid=2324856#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2324654" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; To my nose, it smells sickly sweet and the only vanilla I get is synthetic vanilla. The sugar + red berries notes remind me of a cheap cotton candy body spray. I would not recommend this.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70052"comment_id="2324306"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-70052.html?ccid=2324306#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2322410" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2322410" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="VasPet"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1881634"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1881634.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="VasPet" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2322410ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2322410" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1881634">VasPet</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-21">10/21/24 00:41</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I wanted to write a review for this perfume for way too long and I didn't know how to describe it because for real I never got around to it and the concept of this. I love, ADORE, Eilish 2 and I want to buy it at some point, but this one is exactly what @rachellejj said down below. <br />
<br />
It has a very spicy (but not gourmand spicy in the slightest) syrupy sweet smell that I don't find appealing. It is actually very screechy. The vanilla in the end is better for me, but it is also very synthetic and I can find cheaper perfumes with much better vanilla notes than this one.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2314367" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Vielawska"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2068631"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2068631.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Vielawska" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2314367ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2314367" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2068631">Vielawska</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-13">10/13/24 09:23</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Oh my god, Ive had 3 full bottles of this perfume so far! Its beautiful, its a scent that is gentle but lasts quite long for its price and super delicious, i almost want to bite myself when I have it on, this is a scent that ACTUALLY smells like vanilla (atleast to me), and its sweet. My personal favourite and 10/10, if you enjoy vanilla gourmands, I highly recommend!!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70052"comment_id="2314367"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-70052.html?ccid=2314367#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2314146" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2314146" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="PecanPrincess"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2281940"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2281940.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="PecanPrincess" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Juliette-Has-A-Gun/Miss-Charming-1714.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.1714.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Miss Charming"title="Miss Charming"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2314146ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2314146" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2281940">PecanPrincess</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-13">10/13/24 04:36</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Teeters on the edge of being too sweet for me, but still like it enough to not declutter. The vanilla in this is really interesting for an affordable celebrity fragrance. It's great for fall/winter! I like to layer it with something spicier to help counter the sweetness.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70052"comment_id="2314146"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-70052.html?ccid=2314146#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2313387" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2313387" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="srh37"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1901249"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1901249.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="srh37" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Valentino/Valentino-Donna-Born-In-Roma-Pink-PP-84444.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.84444.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Valentino Donna Born In Roma Pink PP"title="Valentino Donna Born In Roma Pink PP"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2313387ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2313387" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1901249">srh37</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-12">10/12/24 11:24</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I've made it a point to review all my fragrances. this one, by far, probably gets me the most compliments. And it takes me back to a nice time. I bought it in a random ass Walmart in Bakersfield when i was on a school trip. I wore it the next day and walked with a guy on the trip along the highway to get to a panda express because the del taco across the road was too far from the outlet mall we had stopped by. He asked me if i was wearing perfume and said it smelt like cake. It doesn't, to be honest. The dry vanilla note really reminds me of some cozy vanilla hot chocolate you would drink when the autumn fog is drifting through the air outside of your nice cabin in the woods.<br />
<br />
hope this helped </p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70052"comment_id="2313387"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-70052.html?ccid=2313387#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2311416" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2311416" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="PerfumePonderings"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1681029"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="PerfumePonderings" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2311416ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2311416" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1681029">PerfumePonderings</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-10">10/10/24 12:51</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The bottle is abhorrent, the perfume itself is ok. Falls into the same category as a Victoria Secret body spray in terms of scent when you first spray it. It's nondescriptly sweet and mass pleasing but you can also tell they tried to make it have something darker in the background.<br />
<br />
The vanilla used in here is actually nice, it's too bad they didn't just stop there and instead had to overcomplicate things by insisting that it also needed to be "woody."<br />
<br />
I'm not interested in this because the wood/amber notes are problematic after a while. The fragrance just starts to smell like an air fresher once it settles and the type of amber used has that slight celery smell.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2306034" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="windchime_00"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1538994"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1538994.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="windchime_00" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Jo-Malone-London/English-Pear-Freesia-10314.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.10314.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="English Pear & Freesia"title="English Pear & Freesia"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2306034ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2306034" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1538994">windchime_00</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-05">10/05/24 14:09</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The opening is yummy and lovely and she punches above her weight class, smelling among some of the pricier vanilla fragrances, but somehow (and maybe it is just me), the fragrance turns toward a more disappointing direction after just a few minutes.<br />
<br />
I think this is a great fragrance for someone starting their fragrance journey and wanting an entrance to vanilla fragrances or for a teen maybe, but I will not be purchasing a full size.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70052"comment_id="2306034"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-70052.html?ccid=2306034#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2305782" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2304363" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ColorOfLove"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2271019"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2271019.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="ColorOfLove" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-70052.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.70052.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Eilish"title="Eilish"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2304363ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2304363" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2271019">ColorOfLove</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-04">10/04/24 03:11</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>i absolutely /Adore/ this perfume. it has a very strong first spray, i didnt get much of the berry or citrusy scents like others said; it was more spicy with a hint of those musky and woody notes than anything but it had me hooked immediately. the dry down is heavenly, smells like pure vanilla and cacao/tonka bean. even with that it doesnt turn into something like chocolate or lose its true vanilla essence but that might just be because of my ph? either way, its a perfect vanilla fragrance to me. when its 6 hours post spray i can still smell it on my skin which is usually rare for me, and the scent has even survived a wash on some of my shirts which blows me away and it has become my signature scent! &lt;3 <br />
<br />
in my opinion she is timeless, you can wear it in the summer, winter, fall, spring, no matter what she will compliment you. (i do heavily associate it with fall though, its such a nice cozy sweet scent! equivalent to a night in watching movies in your living room after baking some sweet cookies)</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2035335">swrights</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-03">10/03/24 09:21</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I love this perfume, its my signature scent. On both my clothes and skin I can still smell it hours later, and it lasts through school! Its amazing. I dont get a red berry note like most others write reviews about, and on me its incredibly warm, spicy, and almost a rich chocolate to me. I get tons of compliments on it, and I got asked what I was wearing before, because its just THAT GOOD. For the price of a 30ml that Ive got, Ive had mine for around over two years now, and you dont need a lot of sprays. Will definitely be buying a new bottle when this runs out because its just absolutely perfect for autumn.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70052"comment_id="2303552"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-70052.html?ccid=2303552#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2303376" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; I have to wait like a lot to settle and start to feel the chocolate note, some vanilla that doesn't stand out and the woody notes. Kind of masculine and dark. This is not sweet at all. Too spicy throughout the performance. The minty note is a dissapointing note, I wasn't expecting that. I don't hate it but I will most likely give it away.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70052"comment_id="2299083"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-70052.html?ccid=2299083#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2297359" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Love the dry down ON SKIN that I get about 4hrs later (the top notes stay on my clothes - not for me). What perfume has the dry down notes that smell like this one, but hits in the beginning (and stays) rather than at the end?</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70052"comment_id="2297359"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-70052.html?ccid=2297359#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2296829" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2296829" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="anp1072"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2051457"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2051457.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="anp1072" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Memoize-London/Magus-73079.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.73079.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Magus"title="Magus"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2296829ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2296829" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2051457">anp1072</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-27">09/27/24 08:18</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Nothing wrong with a more basic vanilla, might not be the most groundbreaking invention but is still one of my most complimented scents. Its great for layering with some sweet scents and quite nice on its own. <br />
I love that the sweet vanilla is wrapped with more of a spicy touch, wearable in any season</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70052"comment_id="2296829"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-70052.html?ccid=2296829#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2295819" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; <br />
edit: its very strong, 2-3 sprays are enough for the scent trail to be at arms length. my new night out perfume:D</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70052"comment_id="2295819"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-70052.html?ccid=2295819#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2295415" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1723067">Faeriecoma</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-21">09/21/24 23:23</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is a surgery sultry vanilla thats powdery and green! No one mentions how green this perfume is. Its literally a herbaceous gourmand? Think Sci Fi from Ellis Brooklyn. Yes the green fades quickly though leaving behind a smooth musky bakery vanilla. Its very unique, I dont understand when people say its basic.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70052"comment_id="2291082"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-70052.html?ccid=2291082#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2290902" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1713508">smileyforever74</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-21">09/21/24 18:01</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>would love to smell the layered notes ppl write here in the reviews, im not sure if its because different batches have different quality, but on me and even on the sampling paper it smell just like a warm plain vanilla, maybe a bit of coconut. Nothing bad just would have loved to smell something more</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70052"comment_id="2290902"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-70052.html?ccid=2290902#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2290818" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2290818" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="atmospheric"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2251304"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2251304.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="atmospheric" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2290818ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2290818" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2251304">atmospheric</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-21">09/21/24 16:13</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Im on the hunt for a fa/winter vanilla fragrance, so I picked this up with a few other vanillas based on the reviews. On me this is not really a gourmand and smells super cheap and synthetic.<br />
<br />
I know its an affordable celebrity fragrance, but to me its just the wet cardboard vanilla note in Victorias Secret Bare Vanilla with cocoa and Johnsons baby shampoo (specifically the lavender baby shampoo). I dont get any fruits or sugar, I dont even get any actual vanilla. I get a muddled, slightly plasticy babyish sweet smell that Id expect from a cheap body spray. <br />
<br />
You can get this quality at Bath and Body works. I hate to be a hater, but I wouldnt spend the extra money to get that quality in a more fun bottle. It also kind of reminds me of the Library of Flowers True Vanilla, but to me this is significantly less wearable- mostly because of how much it smells like baby shampoo and cardboard.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70052"comment_id="2290818"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-70052.html?ccid=2290818#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2290515" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2290515" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="CherryPancakes"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2177508"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2177508.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="CherryPancakes" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2290515ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2290515" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2177508">CherryPancakes</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-21">09/21/24 11:07</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I did not expect this to smell the way it does! I expected more vanilla sweetness but the citrus is more prominent</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70052"comment_id="2290515"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-70052.html?ccid=2290515#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2290464" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2290464" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="beautyjolic"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1740060"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1740060.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="beautyjolic" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Jo-Malone-London/Peony-Blush-Suede-18767.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.18767.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Peony & Blush Suede"title="Peony & Blush Suede"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2290464ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2290464" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1740060">beautyjolic</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-21">09/21/24 10:22</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It's a very pretty perfume! Right after spraying I can smell bergamot and cranberry, but when it dries down I smell mostly cacao and vanilla. It's not really a gourmand in a classic sense because it doesn't smell like something edible, but still very cutesy! <br />
Vanilla note from "Eilish" reminds me about vanilla from "Un bois vanille" by Serge Lutens. It smells a little bit artificial to be honest as if it was mixed with beeswax.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70052"comment_id="2290464"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-70052.html?ccid=2290464#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2289810" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; I can't say it lasts a long time. <br />
speaking of longevity. it lasts all day! literally for 8-10 hours but those mint note didnt drop down at all (why why whyyy). the perfume is nice, my skin is on the other hand. <br />
<br />
scent (on paper): 10/10<br />
longevity: 9/10<br />
sillage: 7/10 (the projection is so so)<br />
price: 10/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70052"comment_id="2288941"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-70052.html?ccid=2288941#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2288812" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; The level of sweet versus spicy is just right, and it smells about 6 times more expensive than it is.<br />
<br />
Lasting power is phenomenal - 9 hours on skin, 15 hours on clothes. <br />
<br />
Its cozy but somewhat complex the same time. Never smells synthetic, fake or weird.<br />
<br />
Giving it 10/10 (especially for this price)</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70052"comment_id="2288783"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-70052.html?ccid=2288783#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2284930" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2284081" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="LadyMuck"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/19560"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.19560.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="LadyMuck" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Britney-Spears/Candied-Fantasy-93613.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.93613.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Candied Fantasy"title="Candied Fantasy"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2284081ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2284081" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.84); I do get a hint of mint in the initial spray which isn't mentioned but that is probably part of the spices used.<br />
Overall, the notes warm up well on the skin into a delicious cacao vanilla woody scent.<br />
The bottle design is unique as well.<br />
7/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70052"comment_id="2284081"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-70052.html?ccid=2284081#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2283848" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1950146">Chloerose666</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-10">09/10/24 02:32</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>In my opinion the Mandarin and 'spicy notes' do not go with this scent. Luckily they dissipate quite quickly an you are left with a choco musk type smell. Lasted a good 5-6 hours but honestly not all that impressed with this - its OK.<br />
<br />
If you want this but cheaper buy Choco Musk - Al rehab<br />
<br />
If you want this but better buy Fire at Will - Jovoy</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70052"comment_id="2277714"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-70052.html?ccid=2277714#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2276887" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
