I literally have nothing negative to say about this. I smell the sweet red berries in the top notes and then it dries down to the most beautiful, sugary, vanilla powder type of scent. I also get hints of cacao! But mostly vanilla. I'd recommend this to anyone looking for a sweet and cozy vanilla scent for fall:)</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70052"comment_id="2276887"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-70052.html?ccid=2276887#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2276215" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2276215" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="glassbiome"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1885819"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1885819.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="glassbiome" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Clue-Perfumery/With-the-Candlestick-88206.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.88206.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="With the Candlestick"title="With the Candlestick"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2276215ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2276215" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1885819">glassbiome</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-08">09/08/24 15:04</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I saw this for under $50 and caved. Eilish 2 gets regular wear from me and I've sampled this one before but never purchased a travel spray or FB till now. And I'm so glad I did. I've mentioned before how celebrity fragrances always fall flat and disappoint. Just musky vanillas with one or two floral/fruity notes barely differentiating them in the most god awful plastic caged bottles. But the Eilish line stands out (despite the packaging lol). This is the first time I'm seeing the notes and I'm pleasantly surprised. There is dry, earthy, berry sweetness on open. I don't distinctly get orange (real orange) but more of a vanillic orange. Almost a creamsicle gourmand note. Something I'd usually steer clear from as it falls into the "fake syrupy fruit" category but it's smooth and blends so well with the rest of the fragrance. After some time on the skin it still projects a mouth watering spicy coco powder and vanilla blend. There is a musky, skin scent, woody base that I adore. Though I'm weak for those generally. Among my favorite gourmands it's just too damn good. Like making a spiced hot coco. The rich, unmixed powder sitting atop simmering vanilla milk. Lord. I can see this being an amazing bed wear as well. I'm drooling.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70052"comment_id="2276215"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-70052.html?ccid=2276215#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2272410" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; It smells like Swiss miss with a hint of raspberries at the beginning, on dry down for me I get a lightly powdery cocoa goodness. Such a great cozy scent for fall/winter</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70052"comment_id="2272410"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-70052.html?ccid=2272410#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2271998" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2271998" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="emmaksmith"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2135518"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2135518.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="emmaksmith" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Glossier/You-46885.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.46885.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="You"title="You"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2271998ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2271998" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2135518">emmaksmith</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-04">09/04/24 22:35</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I absolutely adore this fragrance. This is the first non-body mist fragrance I've owned, and I love it with everything in me. I wear this practically every day. What I get from this is a sweet, powdery vanilla. I don't recognize any of the spicey notes, mandarin orange, red berries, or even cocoa. To me it smells like a sophisticated bakery, maybe cupcakes--but in a way that isn't too sweet or cloying. I'm very vanilla obsessed and I have the Finery Sweet on the Outside--which I'd say is very similar, only less powdery, and possibly more of a mature scent. I don't care if this scent is seen as too childish I will be wearing this until I find something I enjoy better.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70052"comment_id="2271998"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-70052.html?ccid=2271998#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2270787" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2270787" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="IsmailP"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2135692"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2135692.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="IsmailP" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2270787ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2270787" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.86); Moderate longevity and value for money .</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70052"comment_id="2270787"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-70052.html?ccid=2270787#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2269594" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2265869" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Sillykn"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1498127"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1498127.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Sillykn" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2265869ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2265869" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.75); The red berries, mandarin, vanilla and cacao work really well. Personally I prefer the dupe Nebras by Lattafa. It lasts longer and had a better bottle IMO.<br />
<br />
If you love Billie or dislike dupes go with the OG. If not safe some money and get the dupe.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70052"comment_id="2265869"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-70052.html?ccid=2265869#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2264762" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2264762" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="kodeined"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2236473"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2236473.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="kodeined" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2264762ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2264762" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2236473">kodeined</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-29">08/29/24 08:52</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>If you are young and keen on vanilla scents in general, you will like this a lot. It's sillage and longevity is pretty high in my opinion, although I don't have the sharpest nose in the shed. I don't have many fragrances in my collection and this one lasts the longest. <br />
<br />
Somehow it reminds me of *eating* macademia nuts, not smelling them. It's weird, I know. And I love macademia a lot.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70052"comment_id="2264762"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-70052.html?ccid=2264762#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2264550" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2264550" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Sweetpea1"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1257856"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1257856.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Sweetpea1" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-70052.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.70052.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Eilish"title="Eilish"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2264550ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2264550" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1257856">Sweetpea1</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-29">08/29/24 04:41</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I absolutely love this perfume. It does open up with a slight minty/spicy note but that fades very quickly and the vanilla aroma comes through and is the prominent note in the dry down. I spray a good 4/5 amount as the olfactory kicks in, so I can detect it after 4/5 hours on myself. It's lasting power is very strong, after a days wear of 8 hours, I can still smell this strongly on my clothes. <br />
<br />
I got compliments while wearing this for only 3 hours, and I was out on a windy warm day. So it is noticeably to others around you. <br />
I have repurchased this perfume, and probably will continue to do so. This is vanilla done right, an easy everyday reach. I also have the body mist of this, and that is beautiful, as it is all rich vanilla. The body mist does not have that spicy note in it, and it actually lasts a couple of hours on your clothes. So even if you don't wear the perfume, the body mist is also perfect for everyday wear, will re-spraying every 3/4 hours. <br />
<br />
I forgot to mention, the bottle is a work of art, so beautiful and really compliments the scent. Well done Billie this one is perfection.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70052"comment_id="2264550"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-70052.html?ccid=2264550#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2263052" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2263052" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="wooperdestiny"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2234646"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2234646.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="wooperdestiny" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2263052ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2263052" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2234646">wooperdestiny</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-27">08/27/24 17:20</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Me recuerda mucho a Black Opium en el sentido de que es un avainillado amaderado y denso.<br />
Deje de llevarlo porque era muy oscuro para llevarlo a diario, definitivamente es de invierno u otonio, y no para abusar en espacios cerrados. <br />
Pero su estela no es lo suficientemente tocha para llevarlo de fiestuki.<br />
Lo adoro tho, solo que es dificil encontrar un buen momento para llevarlo.<br />
El olor es un 10 tho</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70052"comment_id="2263052"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-70052.html?ccid=2263052#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2262246" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2262246" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Rairey326"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2201518"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2201518.gif" class="comments-avatar"alt="Rairey326" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2262246ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2262246" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2201518">Rairey326</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-27">08/27/24 01:37</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Weirdly woody. I dont really get a luscious chocolate and vanilla. I get one of those bitter 90% cacao dark chocolate bars. It smells like bitter chocolate, herbs, and wood. I really dont get much else. <br />
<br />
Years ago, this smelled like heaven to me. I dont know what happened for it to smell like this to my nose now. Ive spritzed this at multiple different stores, and they all smell like my description above. Very sad to admit.<br />
<br />
You want a good chocolate/vanilla gourmand fragrance?<br />
-Choco Musk by Al Rehab (the oil and the EDP are great)<br />
-Amour de Cacao by Comptoir Sud Pacifique<br />
-Nebras by Lataffa</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70052"comment_id="2262246"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-70052.html?ccid=2262246#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2261981" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70052"comment_id="2260846"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-70052.html?ccid=2260846#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2260081" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2260081" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="breeperfumes"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2044428"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="breeperfumes" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Sol-de-Janeiro/Cheirosa-71-63079.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.63079.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Cheirosa '71"title="Cheirosa '71"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2260081ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2260081" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2044428">breeperfumes</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-24">08/24/24 21:37</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is one of my favourite and signature scents. It's got such a beautiful warmth to it. It's got a creamy woody cocoa scent that is so comforting and alluring. <br />
<br />
It reminds me of being curled up by a warm fire, with a creamy hot chocolate during winter. It's so delicious, inviting and cosy. It's a perfect winter or night scent, but I tend to make it work all year round because I love it so much and love having it in my rotation. I love layering it with other warm gourmand scents to make it even more delicious - Sticky Dates shower gel from Lush works so well with this, and the cocoa glow Vaseline moisturiser too. <br />
<br />
In my opinion, this has good longevity and a good scent bubble. I can still smell it on my clothes the next day, and I always get compliments with this perfume. The bottle is cute and I love the dark gold colour but my only complaint is the bottle can be impractical if you want to have it in your handbag. I usually just take the top off to make it less clunky - other than that, it's perfect and one of my favourite fragrances.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70052"comment_id="2260081"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-70052.html?ccid=2260081#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2258177" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:4,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2258177" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="DopamineHunter"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2223378"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2223378.gif" class="comments-avatar"alt="DopamineHunter" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Mod-Vanilla-77799.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.77799.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Mod Vanilla"title="Mod Vanilla"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2258177ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2258177" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2223378">DopamineHunter</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-23">08/23/24 04:45</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>There's so much going on it confuses me. I won't lie, this scent can fill an entire room. I have a classmate in university and this is her signature scent. It is a generic vanilla that smells nice. Not groundbreaking, I think it's ok value for what it offers price-wise. Getting closer to it, it does smell pretty synthetic but... Doesn't every perfume in our day and age? It's just that it's so overused, I smell it everywhere. In university, at least 10 women have admitted to having this as their signature scent. Me personally I don't want to remind a guy of somebody else, but whatever floats your boat. :P <br />
<br />
My brother is getting the mist scent of this, I hope it's way lighter because this is too overwhelming for my nose. Not bad, but too sweet!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70052"comment_id="2258177"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-70052.html?ccid=2258177#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2257852" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2257852" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="cutesoftangel"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2229462"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2229462.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="cutesoftangel" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Mod-Vanilla-77799.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.77799.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Mod Vanilla"title="Mod Vanilla"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2257852ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2257852" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2229462">cutesoftangel</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-22">08/22/24 18:29</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is very VERY spicy and woody. Reminds me of Christmas and bonfires, definitely a scent more suited for colder weather. I wouldn't say this is mainly vanilla as there's a lot going on, it smells like chocolate on my skin after a while. It would be a cozy scent to wear in winter</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70052"comment_id="2257852"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-70052.html?ccid=2257852#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2257512" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/765170">Snicole82</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-21">08/21/24 14:30</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This smells really good. I was hesitant at first, but I like it. It does smell familiar, but cant put my nose on it. The vanilla is sweet with a hint of fruit and chocolate. Average sillage and longevity.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70052"comment_id="2256542"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-70052.html?ccid=2256542#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2256420" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Vanilla with spicy notes, smells so good. It also lasts a long time !</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70052"comment_id="2256420"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-70052.html?ccid=2256420#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2256181" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2256181" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Scheherazade_x"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2213492"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2213492.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Scheherazade_x" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Maison-Martin-Margiela/Jazz-Club-20541.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.20541.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Jazz Club"title="Jazz Club"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2256181ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2256181" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2213492">Scheherazade_x</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-21">08/21/24 07:51</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>So this one to my nose is really similar to Laffata Nebras, except that with the Eilish I *do* get the mint everyone talks about very strongly in the initial spray, and it does smell minty on my skin. I like mint, so thats no problem, but it does make it a different experience - fresher and less immediately sweet/gourmand than I was expecting, although I would still describe it as a gourmand fragrance overall.<br />
<br />
Underneath the mint are those delicious notes of red berries, vanilla, and powdered sugar. A little chocolate also. As it settles down the mint fades and it becomes muskier with hints of spice. <br />
<br />
It projects well and lasts reasonably, although I would say the Nebras beats it on both counts. I have to say Im not in love with the clunky, awkward bottle, but the scent inside is really quite lovely. Definitely worth a look if you enjoy a vanilla heavy gourmand.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70052"comment_id="2256181"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-70052.html?ccid=2256181#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2254532" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2223354">szkrii</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-16">08/16/24 02:51</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>this was one of my first real fragrances. I had to buy it since I literally fell in love with it when I tried it in store. such a beautiful warm cacao-y vanilla. it's really cozy but also a bit sexy and interesting. one of my favorites ever. 10000/10.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2249263" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Sunsoria"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1568403"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1568403.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Sunsoria" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Kayali-Fragrances/Vanilla-Candy-Rock-Sugar-42-92258.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.92258.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Vanilla Candy Rock Sugar | 42"title="Vanilla Candy Rock Sugar | 42"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2249263ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2249263" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1568403">Sunsoria</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-14">08/14/24 13:46</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Smelled it for the first time today, I can now say I am in love and will be grabbing a bottle as soon as I can. <br />
To me, the dry down actually smells similar to the La Creme flanker of Bare Vanilla, which is one of my favorites (sadly discontinued now). <br />
Its a very sugary, chocolatey, edible type of vanilla. I didnt smell much of the fruity/berry notes.<br />
EDIT : Now that its on my skin, I could really smell the fruity opening, especially the red berries. I personally think it makes the fragrance a bit lighter and not too overwhelming. It dries down to a beautiful vanilla-chocolate scent.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70052"comment_id="2249263"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-70052.html?ccid=2249263#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2249081" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Very overrated fragrance.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70052"comment_id="2247168"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-70052.html?ccid=2247168#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2246636" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2246636" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="delight.nur"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2216130"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2216130.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="delight.nur" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-50384.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.50384.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Cloud"title="Cloud"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2246636ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2246636" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2216130">delight.nur</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-12">08/12/24 05:54</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This fragrance is one I reach for all year round, whether it's summer or winter(would not a very popular choice for summer but still). It's such a beautiful vanilla scent that I always repurchase as soon as it runs out. Its rich, warm, and sweet. The opening has a very subtle hint of citrus, but then youre enveloped by the warm, inviting notes of cocoa, sugar, and vanilla. The vanilla in the base notes lingers on your skin for a long time and smells absolutely delicious.<br />
<br />
Its one of the scents that I feel suits me the best. I find it incredibly sexy and feminine. I like to layer it with Bath and Body Works' Joy body spray, and especially in the fall and winter, I get constant compliments on this combinationCONSTANTLY. If you want people to keep asking what you're wearing, I highly recommend this duo.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70052"comment_id="2246636"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-70052.html?ccid=2246636#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2246048" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2246048" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="whiteamber89"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1762573"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1762573.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="whiteamber89" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2246048ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2246048" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1762573">whiteamber89</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-11">08/11/24 14:18</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Over-hyped. Reeks of cherry/grape medicine. <br />
<br />
Im willing to bet whatever is in children's medicinal syrup is the same as this. I tried it on me 10 different times in both cold and hot weather and it just reeks of medicinal stench. Has a very base ammonia smell too. The vanilla is candied and smells artificial so the people who "like" it probably don't know good quality vanilla. <br />
Harsh but just honest opinion <br />
Indult tihota does a better job with quality vanilla but even indult is too plain.<br />
There is a difference between vanilla perfumes!! Vanilla needs other notes to be beautiful, too much of it like this perfume becomes cloying and plain quick. <br />
<br />
X</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70052"comment_id="2246048"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-70052.html?ccid=2246048#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2244339" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/176841">VanilllaPrincess</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-09">08/09/24 19:05</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I don't enjoy the top note of mandarin - it's a little sharp - it's just my personal preference but I don't think cocoa/lactonic notes compliment citrus notes very well. Luckily, it dries down to a beautiful powdery, amber vanilla chocolate, which remains on my clothes for days. Have received compliments for this one!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70052"comment_id="2244339"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-70052.html?ccid=2244339#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2244283" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2244283" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="lilymichelle01"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2045554"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2045554.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="lilymichelle01" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Nest/Wild-Poppy-53153.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.53153.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Wild Poppy"title="Wild Poppy"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2244283ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2244283" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2045554">lilymichelle01</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-09">08/09/24 17:38</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I went into the perfume store looking for my usual perfume but ended up walking out with this. Im not a fan of the first spray, as it comes off very earthy, but the dry off is AMAZING. Very creamy, vanilla, and lightly chocolatey. I thought the sillage was ok, but my boyfriend was able to smell me from a mile away. A very cozy scent and a must have for the colder season. A good choice for vanilla lovers. I would not recommend blind buying though, as it is pricey.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70052"comment_id="2244283"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-70052.html?ccid=2244283#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2242064" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
