(selfish if you ask me). i know this because ive got a very sensitive nose and i find this fragrance particularly cloying so i can smell it every time i walk in to a room with her, on the bright side she said she doesnt spray it every day so it must just be lingering on her clothes, if you like perfumes that are long lasting and smell like a bazaar you will enjoy this</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70052"comment_id="2241589"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-70052.html?ccid=2241589#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2241322" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2241322" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="venusiangel"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2208518"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2208518.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="venusiangel" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Prada/Prada-Paradoxe-Intense-83988.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.83988.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Prada Paradoxe Intense"title="Prada Paradoxe Intense"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2241322ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2241322" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2208518">venusiangel</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-06">08/06/24 22:34</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Okay I tried this on two occassions so walk w me real quick...<br />
1. the first time it was a DREAM. edible. incredible, hypnotizing. a very warm vanilla and ambery as promised. i was so embarrassed at how much i loved it because I'll admit I'm a bit pretentious and quick to dismiss celebrity perfumes...but it was one of my favorite gourmands I've ever smelt in the past year. it immediately smells like vanilla and chocolate on the first spray (even wearing a kn95 in ulta) and it sticksss for half an hour or so but the dry down? an hour in it still smells great. the woody base notes come out + the slightestttt notes of cacao and maybe rose if you try really hard. its leaning on grassy wood. but you gotta put your nose to it imo. however...I also tried on Burberry Goddess on the same day and I then thought Eilish was the better AND more affordable Vanilla Gourmand between the two. I NEARLY walked out the store with it just upon first impression, but I know better and I always wait for the dry down (and longevity because vanillas can easily become crazy synthetic).<br />
2. The second time, yesterday, was vastly different. I put it on just because and while my first impression months back was enthralling and exciting, it fell short this time. Maybe it was a bad bottle, the cacao didn't leap out for me like a warm plate of fresh brownies the way it initially did and that broke my heart fr because I LOVE a good complex vanilla. I was a devoted warm vanilla sugar girl in middle school and used other cvs vanilla perfumes and this time Eilish was giving more cheap vanilla body mist. Which is fine! but not for the this price point. doesnt smell playdoh-y but its justflatly vanilla, slightly synthetic, and nothing more. not sure where we went wrong.<br />
however upon mixing with my skin several hours later its so much better. i smell more of that chocolatey goodness. I will say the longevity on this perfume justifies the price -it is STILL on my clothes 24 hours later and lingering so so slightly in my inner elbow the night after!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70052"comment_id="2241322"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-70052.html?ccid=2241322#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2240915" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2240915" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="tamyohls"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2214606"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2214606.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="tamyohls" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2240915ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2240915" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2214606">tamyohls</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-06">08/06/24 13:33</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I sprayed on my arm and like it so i decided to buy it, weirdly enough after buyinn it and spraying from a full size bottle it smelled to me like vanilla incense, i dislike incense very much, so i am upset. Didnt realised when i tried before.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70052"comment_id="2240915"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-70052.html?ccid=2240915#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2240231" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2240231" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Deedee333"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2144180"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2144180.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Deedee333" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2240231ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2240231" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2144180">Deedee333</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-05">08/05/24 22:41</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Oh...my God! I'm so glad I ended up purchasing this perfume. I was afraid because some people loved it, but others hated it,  and It just seemed like a hit or miss, and not to mention, a lot of mixed reviews came with this product regarding the vanilla scent and the dry down. <br />
<br />
I, myself enjoyed this fragrance so much. It's lasted me literally 6-7 hours, and I'm still smelling it close to my skin. It's a very unique vanilla scent, not your usual cakey, sweet, icing, type of smell. It's a grown and mature vanilla that comes off very sexy and mysterious, in my opinion. The sugar, cacao, and woodsy notes hit hard with a beautiful balance next to the vanilla note, and I love it! I will say the cacao comes out more in the dry down, and that mix of vanilla and cacao works for me. The performance is amazing, projection and sillage are top of the line for this to be a celebrity fragrance. I feel like most celebrity fragrances are too light for me, but this one hits the mark really well. This is great for daily wear, but definitely wear this out on a date, as it lasts long enough, and your person is just going to enjoy smelling it on you. You can wear this on a night out, as well as on a beautiful night alone in your home, just relaxing. I am going to experiment with layering this with some of my other fragrances as well because I just feel this will get along with other scents as well. I highly recommend this. I know it's a celebrity fragrance, and I understand what some people are saying, but please try it on your own because it really is going to hit differently for everyone. Anybody who loves grown and sexy vanilla scents will enjoy this, in my opinion. A definite keeper for me!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70052"comment_id="2240231"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-70052.html?ccid=2240231#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2240121" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2240121" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="amykk"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2213889"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2213889.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="amykk" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2240121ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2240121" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2213889">amykk</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-05">08/05/24 19:53</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This perfume smells like vanilla sunscreen. It smells really good initially but then when it dries down, it smells like sunscreen. I think there are better vanilla perfumes out there but it's good for what it's priced.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70052"comment_id="2240121"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-70052.html?ccid=2240121#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2239807" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2239807" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="meowth3000"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2210254"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2210254.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="meowth3000" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2239807ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2239807" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2210254">meowth3000</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-05">08/05/24 13:25</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>i got told i smelled like battery acid when i wore this</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70052"comment_id="2239807"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-70052.html?ccid=2239807#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2239287" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2239287" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="sootysalters"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1818216"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1818216.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="sootysalters" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2239287ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2239287" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1818216">sootysalters</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-05">08/05/24 02:35</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I really wanted to like this but I really do not. Way too heavy and cloying for me, I could barely wear it for 10 minutes.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70052"comment_id="2239287"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-70052.html?ccid=2239287#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2239038" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2239038" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Heilaluscious"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2173131"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2173131.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Heilaluscious" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Burberry/Burberry-Her-Elixir-de-Parfum-75968.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.75968.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Burberry Her Elixir de Parfum"title="Burberry Her Elixir de Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2239038ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2239038" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2173131">Heilaluscious</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-04">08/04/24 18:41</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I have been slowly working my way through a few vanilla heavy scents to find a new signature. My husband and I are childhood sweethearts and finding a scent we both love is absolutely required. Being a thoughtful man, he bought me a travel size version of Ellish to test on his own accord. For the first several months of owning and wearing Ellish for a day or two a week, I enjoyed the scent but found it to be a bit on the cool and flat side. <br />
<br />
Occasionally, I spray the scents I am trialing on a few hours before my husband gets home from work and ask if he can smell anything and if so, if he enjoys it. He never picks up on Ellish, even when I spray very liberally after the two or three hour mark. He even likes the scent upon immediate application. I concluded it was a product I would be happy to use up before trialing to something different. <br />
<br />
Then, strangely, I put Ellish on before hiking with my dog on a particularly hot day. We left early to avoid the heat but it caught up with us due to distractions and other hikers. My dog is a striking, extremely petite, giant breed dog so we are always stopped by people who want to pet her and ask me questions as her size is not breed standard. <br />
<br />
During that last half an hour of our time outside, Ellish turned into a monster on my skin. The powdery base became overwhelming to the point at which I felt like I smelled like fresh diapers or feminine products right out of the packet. It almost embarrassed me. I have put Ellish to the side for the time and return to it in the fall.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70052"comment_id="2239038"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-70052.html?ccid=2239038#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2237540" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2237540" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="milkteafairy"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1761948"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1761948.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="milkteafairy" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2237540ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2237540" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1761948">milkteafairy</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-03">08/03/24 06:35</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I used to be obsessed with this perfume, but eventually got bored of it. It is a safe choice of vanilla imo. Definitely a crowd pleaser, my ex told me I smelt like chocolate when I wore this.<br />
Got a lot of compliments wearing this. Pretty basic. <br />
The initial smell is minty, but that disappears and transforms into a nice vanilla and chocolate.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70052"comment_id="2237540"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-70052.html?ccid=2237540#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2235540" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:4,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2235540" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="freyja0619"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2209692"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2209692.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="freyja0619" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Britney-Spears/Midnight-Fantasy-802.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.802.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Midnight Fantasy"title="Midnight Fantasy"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2235540ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2235540" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2209692">freyja0619</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-01">08/01/24 05:46</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>such a sweet gorgeous perfume i could wear this forever, its not overwhelmingly vanilla which i LOVE and think is rare in a vanilla based perfume, its very autumnal maybe thats because i bought it in autumn but its the perfect scent for those cold comfy days, every time i have worn this out i get complimented <br />
i think billie did so well making this as her first perfume</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70052"comment_id="2235540"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-70052.html?ccid=2235540#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2233926" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2233926" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="star06"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1935163"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1935163.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="star06" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2233926ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2233926" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1935163">star06</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-30">07/30/24 12:33</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I really love this scent, and seemingly so does everyone around me lol. This is easily my most complimented fragrance of all time, seemingly everytime I wear it I get at least one comment about how good it smells. Once a little boy on the subway even told me I smelled like vanilla cupcakes and thats how ik its good bc kids dont lie lmaooo. I pair it with the nemat vanilla musk oil and it smells heavenly. On me it smells like a sweet, musky, vanilla with a swirl of chocolate mixed in. Commentators have likened it to cookies, cakes, and frappuccinos. Its a basic, crowd pleasing scent and very easy to wear; its not overbearing or overpowering, and its sweet without being juvenile or sickening. In terms of performance longevity wise, it does fade throughout the day; on me it lasts a good 5-6hrs before i feel the need to reapply. It definitely lasts long on clothes than on skin, when i change my clothes I can still smell it on them. Ive seen people complain about the sillage but its not bad imo, Id say people can smell it within an arms length of you (think casual conversation, sitting with someone to have lunch, etc) which is fine by me. Overall Id definitely recommend this fragrance, however I do always suggest getting a sampler first, even if you think youll like a fragrance based on its notes/description, because perfumes smell different on everyone!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70052"comment_id="2233926"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-70052.html?ccid=2233926#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2232068" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2232068" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Rickie-Refractory"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1688483"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1688483.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Rickie-Refractory" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Donna-Karan/Cashmere-Mist-EDP-53109.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.53109.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Cashmere Mist EDP"title="Cashmere Mist EDP"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2232068ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2232068" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1688483">Rickie-Refractory</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-28">07/28/24 15:11</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I want to love Eilish so much because it reminds me of the long-discontinued Vanilla Noir from Bath and Body Works, which was the best scent they ever made. However, Eilish has a pretty strong dose of whatever creates that cheap twinge that I smell in so many celeb perfumes. I will admit I mostly get that while sniffing close to my skin and that it dissipates with space, but this isnt exactly $25 for a 100ml like most other perfumes I get that from, so I expect more.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70052"comment_id="2232068"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-70052.html?ccid=2232068#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2231685" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2231685" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="whichoneisit"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1335151"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1335151.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="whichoneisit" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Novellista/Vanilla-Club-72862.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.72862.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Vanilla Club"title="Vanilla Club"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2231685ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2231685" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1335151">whichoneisit</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-28">07/28/24 06:09</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It is a very easy to wear, flat vanilla cupcake scent that needs to be generously applied.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70052"comment_id="2231685"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-70052.html?ccid=2231685#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2230538" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2230538" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="duchess_dollie"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2199066"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="duchess_dollie" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2230538ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2230538" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2199066">duchess_dollie</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-26">07/26/24 20:11</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I gotta say, Billie Eilish's perfume bottles are so beautiful, probably one of my favorites, so simple but it just hits different for me since it was my first ever real perfume gifted by my parents around 12 or 13. It's literally a half bust of a body, I've always loved how women's bodies symbolize art when people choose to appreciate it, like art from the Renaissance.<br />
<br />
On to the smell. The smell is what got me into gourmand perfumes specifically; it was love at first smell for me. Smell very sweet and vanilla like obviously.. the only thing I don't like is how I can smell and alcohol smell at the beginning, yet it does fade. It is a classic vanilla fragrance, who can go wrong with that?<br />
<br />
Longevity wise.. pretty good. I remember spraying it on the inner elbow before bed and waking up to it still on there slightly faded but present. Silliage is mediocre honestly but fine for what you're paying for.<br />
<br />
Overall, love this perfume, good if you're just getting into vanilla, beautiful bottle and would recommend.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70052"comment_id="2230538"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-70052.html?ccid=2230538#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2229910" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2229910" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Jessalyne"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2198804"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Jessalyne" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2229910ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2229910" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2198804">Jessalyne</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-26">07/26/24 07:37</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>My initial reaction was that it smelled just like vanilla extract. However, when I sprayed it on and let it settle, it had a sweet vanilla, sugar-y chocolate-y smell to it. I can see why it is sweet to some people.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70052"comment_id="2229910"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-70052.html?ccid=2229910#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2229612" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2229612" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Noelle02"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2204401"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Noelle02" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2229612ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2229612" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2204401">Noelle02</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-25">07/25/24 21:31</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I got this one about a year ago. It starts off as a pretty basic, simple vanilla. Still elegant, but not too complex or special, although it was quickly a winter staple of mine because it goes with everything. However, as I have had it longer it has turned almost candied- think like walking past a store that makes caramel corn. Sweet, deluxe, and decadent without being overpowering. The candied vanilla scent adds sooo much dimension, but I have no idea how it turned that way beyond simply time (I compared with one of my friend's new bottles, and hers still smells like classic vanilla, so it did age somehow. Mine also never leaves the house, so its climate controlled). It is also strong and stays on forever, I only need one spritz and I can smell it all day, and it is still present after a long shower if I apply it directly on skin- I can smell it up to two days after. Despite this I don't find it overpowering (I hate perfumes that are too bold, I prefer a discovered not announced approach to scents). Anyways, this is one of my favorite perfumes, it layers wonderfully, and I think it is a great staple perfume and a model example of what a classic vanilla should be.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70052"comment_id="2229612"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-70052.html?ccid=2229612#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2229341" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2229341" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="loulu03"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2204142"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="loulu03" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2229341ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2229341" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2204142">loulu03</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-25">07/25/24 14:37</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>TLDR; Do not blind buy. <br />
<br />
I bought this for myself blindly after seeing the praise online and the description of it being this sweet gourmand male magnet scent (lol) was really interesting to me but honestly, it's all bs. When you first spritz it onto your skin yoy get a waft of warm SPICE. After you try to shake off the itch in your nose for the next ten seconds, you're left with pretty much nothing. You have to aggressively sniff. your skin to get a hint of sweetness: a sugar and cacao mix. Absolutely no projection on this thing, I might as well be wearing a Victoria's Secret body mist - except that would at least give off some scent. IDK, maybe it just doesn't suit my skin but I really am pretty upset about how this turned out :(. Will try once more when the weather gets cooler but definitely would never recommend this to anyone.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70052"comment_id="2229341"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-70052.html?ccid=2229341#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2229099" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2229099" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Jennswen"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1622836"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1622836.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Jennswen" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Burberry/My-Burberry-Black-32566.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.32566.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="My Burberry Black"title="My Burberry Black"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2229099ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2229099" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1622836">Jennswen</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-25">07/25/24 10:37</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Malted milk and butter. Very fluffy. Nice with winter sweater! 1.0oz $42 walmart.<br />
Yes, juvenile. Yes, edible, but sometimes you need to feel edible and youthful .  It is a typical celebrity perfume which lacks that certain something. I'm not mad at it. It is what it is.  Hempz body lotions might have a scent in this category.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70052"comment_id="2229099"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-70052.html?ccid=2229099#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2227958" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2227958" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="vinegarsyndrome"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1681438"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1681438.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="vinegarsyndrome" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Frederic-Malle/Carnal-Flower-1024.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.1024.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Carnal Flower"title="Carnal Flower"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2227958ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2227958" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1681438">vinegarsyndrome</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-24">07/24/24 07:25</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A vanilla cake pop with mint-white chocolate icing.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70052"comment_id="2227958"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-70052.html?ccid=2227958#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2227664" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2227664" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Mr_Mitch_Sorrenstein"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2202649"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2202649.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Mr_Mitch_Sorrenstein" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2227664ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2227664" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2202649">Mr_Mitch_Sorrenstein</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-23">07/23/24 23:49</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>God damn this shit is good.<br />
<br />
Im a dude but a huge fan of Billie Eilish, so I had to cop this, even if it was marketed towards women. Even though its marketed towards women, I believe this could totally be rocked as unisex. This fragrance has a certain deepness to it that I feel adds a unisex element, making it a potential choice for guys. The sugar, vanilla, and cacao beans smell SOOO delicious and soothing, although I dont get any mandarin orange or berries. Theres also a bit of spice to it that adds another bit of tastiness to the scent. Wear this and people will want to eat you alive. Its the first fragrance of mine that actually got a compliment; I got in the car with some of my friends and one of them said dude you smell hella good. YESSIR I DO!!! <br />
<br />
My only complaint is that the performance (on me at least) is subpar. I usually dont overspray fragrances, but with this one, its pretty much a must. Even with 10+ sprays all over my body and clothes + using lotion to seal it in, Im only getting about 3-4 hours of solid projection until it just fades away, which requires me to respray in the middle of the day. It isnt me being nose-blind either, I asked my friend if he could get a whiff of it when I walked by or sat next to him and he could barely get a scent. I know theres a stronger dupe of it by Lattafa named Nebras, and while its damn near identical, its noticeably deeper (makes me nauseous) and not as sweet. I 100% prefer Eilish, even if its much weaker.<br />
<br />
I went through the 1 oz bottle of this in about 4 months so I bought a new 3.4 oz bottle. Ill definitely use it when this California weather decides to calm its ass the fuck down.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70052"comment_id="2227664"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-70052.html?ccid=2227664#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2225321" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2225321" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Chesu Bowa"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1262337"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1262337.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Chesu Bowa" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2225321ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2225321" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1262337">Chesu Bowa</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-21">07/21/24 11:12</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>My boyfriend loves this one on me, I got it for my birthday at a nearby Rexall and Im honestly so impressed with the quality for the price. <br />
<br />
Its warm and inviting, mostly vanilla and chocolate  here. Lasts long, very elegant,  just delicious. The only celebrity fragrance that I think is worth trying. A true sweet vanilla without being juvenile or heavy. </p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70052"comment_id="2225321"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-70052.html?ccid=2225321#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2224869" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2224869" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="gdecker"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2200028"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2200028.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="gdecker" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2224869ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2224869" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2200028">gdecker</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-20">07/20/24 21:32</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Upon first smelling this on the tester I was in love with the vanilla note. It was a luxurious, boozy smelling vanilla but it had a smokiness that I didnt quite care for. Im surprised I dont see that mentioned more in the reviews. <br />
<br />
But I liked the uniqueness of the vanilla and spices enough to try it anyway. I really wanted to love it but as soon as I sprayed it on my skin it turned into a monster from hell and smelled like dirty leather and CIGARETTES. Ughhh it was AWFUL! Definitely not a safe blind buy. Im glad this works for some but def did not work with my body chemistry.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70052"comment_id="2224869"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-70052.html?ccid=2224869#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2223510" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; <br />
Sensual Vanilla from Zara smells pretty much the same.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70052"comment_id="2222426"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-70052.html?ccid=2222426#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div>                            <reviews-infinity :random-colors="[&quot;#fefcee&quot;,&quot;#faf7ec&quot;,&quot;#f9f9f3&quot;,&quot;#f8f9ec&quot;,&quot;#fffdea&quot;,&quot;#faf9fb&quot;,&quot;#faf5f2&quot;,&quot;#f7f4f2&quot;]" :perfume-id="70052" sentiment="all"></reviews-infinity>

</div>
</div><div class="tabs-panel" id="popular-positive-reviews"><div class="cell">
    <div class="strike-title"><span>Most Popular Positive Reviews</span></div>
    <div class="grid-x grid-padding-x grid-margin-y" style="position: relative; padding: 0 0.25rem 0 0.25rem;">
                            <div id="parent1490020" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1490020" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="britneyalea"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1425010"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1425010.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="britneyalea" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Navitus-Parfums/Venom-of-Love-76980.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.76980.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Venom of Love"title="Venom of Love"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1490020ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck8x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1490020" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1425010">britneyalea</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-01-24">01/24/22 12:22</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This smells so good! I'm not sure what issue you could have with this. I feel like a lot of people dislike celebrity scents in general and aren't open-minded about some of them actually being good. Its not groundbreaking, but I do like how it smells a lot! It's very vanilla/chocolate heavy with a little spice on the dry down. The projection is close to the skin for sure. Even with over spraying it would be moderate at best, but I can smell it on me from earlier today so it lasts at least 5 or so hours. People who are close to you will smell it, but it's not leaving any scent trails. I got it for the bottle tbh  and Im glad I have it in my collection. The bottle is really heavy and Im gonna use it as decor lol.<br />
<br />
I wear it with choco musk oil to amp up the cacao note and to help with projection and they pair so well together! Also, it's on Ulta's website now so you don't have to pay that crazy shipping fee if you want to grab it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70052"comment_id="1490020"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-70052.html?ccid=1490020#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1497303" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1497303" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="mysweetpiano"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1454288"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1454288.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="mysweetpiano" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1497303ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck7x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1497303" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1454288">mysweetpiano</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-02-03">02/03/22 21:11</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>i have a lot of thoughts about this fragrance! the first time i ever smelled it i was really disappointed because i thought that it smelled like a bath and body works body spray, and for triple the price. but it has since grown on me SO much. i think that it's one of my favorite vanilla scents of all time. it is incredibly long lasting and once it dries down it is much less of an overpowering sugar scent and more of a luxe vanilla cacao scent. it is definitely more of a winter scent but i think i'll find myself wearing it all year. this perfume had people stopping me to ask what i was wearing all day, it lasts forever! i have two bottles hehe &lt;33</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70052"comment_id="1497303"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-70052.html?ccid=1497303#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1487911" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1487911" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="adaloza"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1448605"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1448605.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="adaloza" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1487911ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck6x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1487911" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1448605">adaloza</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-01-21">01/21/22 09:03</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I had expected something more musky, but this is heavily vanilla scented and quite sweethowever, Im delighted with it! To describe this perfume as nostalgic is an understatement. It reminded me of Bath &amp; Body Works Warm Vanilla Sugar, Vanilla Frosting Lipsmackers, and after about 12 hours, Lucky Charms. It brought a variety of childhood and teenage scents back to me at once, and it made me smile. I think Billie herself described it as a warm embrace, and that feels strangely accurate. Like giving a younger version of me, wearing pony beads and body glitter, a big hug. But dont get me wrong, its got substance and some staying power and notes that you wont find in a body spray cloud before a school dance. Its just interesting enough to please the adult in me without relinquishing any of its nostalgic glory. If youre not into vanilla or are looking for something complex, this wont be for you. But if youre easily delighted by the nostalgia and dont mind the price, youll love it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70052"comment_id="1487911"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-70052.html?ccid=1487911#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1493926" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1493926" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="rosehips"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1449574"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1449574.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="rosehips" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Burberry/Burberry-Her-51694.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.51694.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Burberry Her"title="Burberry Her"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1493926ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck6x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1493926" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.72);
