A soft vanilla that doesnt choke me out. Stays close to the skin but has decent staying power.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70052"comment_id="1493926"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-70052.html?ccid=1493926#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1445036" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1445036" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="LP2018"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1167127"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="LP2018" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Kayali-Fragrances/The-Wedding-Silk-Santal-36-83208.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.83208.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="The Wedding Silk Santal | 36"title="The Wedding Silk Santal | 36"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1445036ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck6x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1445036" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1167127">LP2018</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-11-13">11/13/21 06:49</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I really like this!  The bottle is huge and a little hard to hold, but looks cool on my dresser next to my more mainstream bottles.  This scent IS like a warm embrace.  It starts off with the berries and the spices and then I get the cocoa and vanilla.  It kind of reminds me of Vanilla West Indies (a favorite of mine thats been out of stock for over a year) but softer and more nuanced.  The longevity is really good.  I wore it yesterday and could still smell it about 7 hours later.  I think Ms. Eilish did a great job on this perfume.  While its not groundbreaking, its a beautiful vanilla without being overly sweet or cloying.  My 22 year old daughter loves it as well.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70052"comment_id="1445036"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-70052.html?ccid=1445036#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div>                            <reviews-infinity :random-colors="[&quot;#fefcee&quot;,&quot;#faf7ec&quot;,&quot;#f9f9f3&quot;,&quot;#f8f9ec&quot;,&quot;#fffdea&quot;,&quot;#faf9fb&quot;,&quot;#faf5f2&quot;,&quot;#f7f4f2&quot;]" :perfume-id="70052" sentiment="positive"></reviews-infinity>
            </div>
</div>
</div><div class="tabs-panel" id="popular-negative-reviews"><div class="cell">
    <div class="strike-title"><span>Most Popular Negative Reviews</span></div>
    <div class="grid-x grid-padding-x grid-margin-y" style="position: relative; padding: 0 0.25rem 0 0.25rem;">
                            <div id="parent1448345" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1448345" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="jeca"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="jeca" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Houbigant/Quelques-Fleurs-Royale-Collection-Privee-50923.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.50923.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Quelques Fleurs Royale Collection Privee"title="Quelques Fleurs Royale Collection Privee"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1448345ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck9x0"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1448345" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2">jeca</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-11-18">11/18/21 17:27</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Just got my bottle. I am sorry to say, but it is not just bad, it is horrible. It is not art, it is not even good commercial perfume. Pickles and screaming vanilla. Chocolate makes the vanilla synthetic and so annoyingly cloying. Pickles? I guess it was an unsuccessful attempt to make it a unisex fragrance. Just bad. The bottle is even worse in reality than in the picture. Big, unreasonable, inconvenient, not beautiful. It is one time purchase perfume. I am sorry, it is the truth. You can like it only for poor Billie's sake.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70052"comment_id="1448345"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-70052.html?ccid=1448345#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1449274" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1449274" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="santeripe"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1350593"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1350593.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="santeripe" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Rania-J/Musc-Moschus-54877.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.54877.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Musc Moschus"title="Musc Moschus"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1449274ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck7x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1449274" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1350593">santeripe</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-11-20">11/20/21 10:16</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>My sister got this and enjoys it, but it's just disappointing to me. The overall feel is synthetic. It's like this tried to be something it couldn't quite reach, so it fell flat on its grandiose plans. On top of the syntheticness, which is usually a compromise for nuclear performance, this barely gives a scent bubble and disappears within a couple hours. There are countless similar synthetic deep scents that have brutal performance for half the price!<br />
<br />
I also can't believe someone would "chase after" the vanilla used here. It's flat and plain. Natural Madagascar vanilla is obviously the best kind, but clever blending can make even synthetic vanillin smell delicious and realistic. That's unfortunately not the case here. The cacao and spices do compliment the vanilla, but they don't make it any less hollow.<br />
<br />
To be fair, this doesn't necessarily smell bad. It just smells like a contract cash-grab done by the highest bidder, seasoned with beautiful marketing and empty promises. _()_/<br />
<br />
I'd love for Billie to embrace the synthetics and do something minimalist, new and interesting. Which seems to be her own taste as well! It's hard to create an impressive and complex classical perfume for cheap. But the niche ones she loves, like Another 13, are just mixes of a few synthetic aromachemicals.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70052"comment_id="1449274"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-70052.html?ccid=1449274#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1499867" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1499867" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="LadyVenganza"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1200107"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1200107.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="LadyVenganza" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Le-Monde-Gourmand/Creme-Brulee-73667.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.73667.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Crme Brle"title="Crme Brle"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1499867ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck6x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1499867" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1200107">LadyVenganza</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-02-07">02/07/22 22:10</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Im sorry but this is awful. Its got that same plasticky baby doll scent in the base as Pink Sugar, except Pink Sugar is $20 and this is going for the same price as a grey market Montale.. This is NOTHING like Warm Vanilla Sugar. <br />
<br />
Bringing the attention back to the plastic baby doll smell, I also got faint notes of cacao on my skin and a plasticky synthetic vanilla. No berries on my skin, but I did smell the berry notes on a tester strip. <br />
<br />
There are MUCH better fragrances available on the market at the same price point. And if you absolutely MUST have a celebrity fragrance, go for the Ariana Grande range. <br />
<br />
Save your money on this one.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70052"comment_id="1499867"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-70052.html?ccid=1499867#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1447774" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1447774" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="audreyg"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1266687"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1266687.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="audreyg" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Delina-Exclusif-50370.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.50370.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Delina Exclusif"title="Delina Exclusif"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1447774ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1447774" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1266687">audreyg</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-11-17">11/17/21 19:41</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I love Billie and I definitely only bought this because of that (and the bottle is SO pretty), and unfortunately for me that remains the only reason I bought this. It's a weak sweet vanilla. Truthfully? Warm vanilla sugar, vanilla bean noel, and other cheap scents that I have grown out of are better than this.<br />
<br />
At first spray it's upfront vanilla as expected, but not really anything else that was listed in the notes. 30 minutes to an hour after I sprayed it on my wrist it's continuing pretty linearly as an extremely basic vanilla frag. If it was a rich, beautiful, realistic vanilla, I would be happy with that. However, the vanilla in Eilish is synthetic and unsatisfying. I don't even think I could mix this with anything and be happy about the end result because I don't really like this scent. It's not necessarily "gross," but it's just not something I  am enthusiastic about and I'm fairly disappointed. I was extremely excited about Billie Eilish making a perfume because I love her music and her recent Old Hollywood vibe. It's too bad. <br />
<br />
EDIT: On second and third wears, it is growing on me slightly. Over a couple days Eilish has shown itself to be a pleasant enough synthetic vanilla fragrance for the masses. I'm not a fragrance snob, but this is definitely somewhat plain considering my usual taste (peep the Serge Lutens quote in my bio). I would give it a solid "alright" upon further wears.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70052"comment_id="1447774"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-70052.html?ccid=1447774#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1447201" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1447201" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="FeminineGhost"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1415419"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="FeminineGhost" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1447201ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1447201" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1415419">FeminineGhost</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-11-16">11/16/21 22:04</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I wanted to love this scent but unfortunately it is a miss to me. This is for vanilla lovers only- its a STRONG gormand vanilla, almost like vanilla extract. The first spray is very harsh alcohol and vanilla and then vanilla and sugar sit for the majority of the time as it dries. Once it dries cocoa and spices are detectable. I would prefer this much spicier. <br />
That being said I have a new bottle in its entire packaging ready to go. Im sure someone will love this but the vanilla was simply too strong for my body chemistry.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="70052"comment_id="1447201"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-70052.html?ccid=1447201#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div>                            <reviews-infinity :random-colors="[&quot;#fefcee&quot;,&quot;#faf7ec&quot;,&quot;#f9f9f3&quot;,&quot;#f8f9ec&quot;,&quot;#fffdea&quot;,&quot;#faf9fb&quot;,&quot;#faf5f2&quot;,&quot;#f7f4f2&quot;]" :perfume-id="70052" sentiment="negative"></reviews-infinity>
            </div>
</div>

<div class="freeStarFragrantica" align="center" data-freestar-ad="__300x250" id="fragranticacom_perfume_mrec_1" v-pre>
</div>
        
        <div class="strike-title"><span>Perfume Reviews</span></div>

    // Check that service workers are supported
    if ('serviceWorker' in navigator) {
        // Use the window load event to keep the page load performant
        window.addEventListener('load', () => {
            navigator.serviceWorker.register('/service-worker.js?v=rtgFr7c4b6b084f801d1036ebe90095780be1');
        });
    }
</script>
